description.0: An obsidian blade of unparalleled sharpness, light as a song. It was modified by a certain artisan to come equipped with a record-playing detachable Phlogiston Device.

0.0: Gain "Ode to Flowers" after Normal or Plunging Attacks hit an opponent: DEF increases by <cryo>8%</cryo> and gain a <cryo>10%</cryo> All Elemental DMG Bonus for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can trigger once per 0.1s. When this effect reaches 2 stacks or the 2nd stack's duration is refreshed, increase all nearby party members' All Elemental DMG Bonus by <cryo>8%</cryo> for every 1,000 DEF the equipping character has, up to a maximum of <cryo>25.6%</cryo>, for 15s.
